name: FreeSWITCH
description: Open source multi-protocol, cross-platform and software switch.

name: Asterisk
description: PBX framework supporting multiple protocols and platforms.

name: Kamailio
description: Open source SIP server widely deployed by carriers and providers. Formerly known as OpenSER.

name: OpenSIPS
description: Open source SIP server, tracing its roots in OpenSER (presently Kamailio).

name: Routr
description: Lightweight SIP proxy, location server, and registrar written in Node.js.

name: Sippy B2BUA
description: Back-to-back user agent server written in Python.

name: Flexisip
description: SIP server suite comprising proxy, presence and group chat functions.

name: Janus
description: Lightweight open source, general purpose, WebRTC gateway.

name: RTPProxy
description: General purpose high performance RTP proxy.

name: RTP:Engine
description: RTP and UDP based media traffic proxy, usable as a kernel module.

name: mediasoup
description: Specialized WebRTC conferencing system.

name: SEMS
description: Open source media and application server for SIP based VoIP services.

name: Jitsi
description: A collection of RTC open source projects, with a focus on conferencing software.

name: coturn
description: Fully featured TURN/STUN server supporting multiple platforms.

name: STUNTMAN
description: RFC compliant open source STUN implementation.

name: sngrep
description: Terminal based SIP flow viewer.

name: sipgrep
description: Console tool for sniffing, capturing and exploring SIP traffic.

name: rtpbreak
description: Detect, reconstruct and analyze RTP sessions.

name: HOMER
description: Multi-protocol capturing and monitoring framework for RTC.

name: WebRTC Troubleshooter
description: One stop client-side WebRTC troubleshooter.

name: Trickle ICE
description: Exposes client-side NAT traversal debug data.

name: SIP3
description: VoIP & RTC traffic monitoring and analysis platform.

name: SIPp
description: Traffic generator for the SIP protocol.

name: SIPVicious
description: Suite of security tools that can be used to audit SIP based VoIP systems.

name: sipsak
description: SIP stress and diagnostics utility.

name: Kazoo
description: Carrier-grade VoIP API platform using FreeSWITCH and Kamailio.

name: FusionPBX
description: Multitenant system built on top of FreeSWITCH.

name: FreePBX
description: Web Manager for Asterisk.

name: CGRateS
description: Carrier grade open source billing/rating server.

name: A2Billing
description: Billing system for Asterisk for multiple applications.

name: PyFreeBilling
description: Wholesale billing platform for Kamailio and FreeSWITCH.

name: Official Website
description: Entry level WebRTC resources.

name: Getting Started With WebRTC
description: WebRTC tutorial by HTML5 Rocks.

name: WebRTC Samples
description: Collection of samples demonstrating various parts of the WebRTC APIs.

name: WebRTC Experiments
description: Comprehensive list of samples by Muaz Khan.

name: Interactive Codelab
description: 30 minutes step by step live tutorial by Google.

name: drachtio
description: Node.js SIP server framework.

name: adapter.js
description: JavaScript shim for abstracting WebRTC spec changes and inconsistencies.

name: JsSIP
description: Lightweight open source JavaScript SIP library.

name: sipML5
description: Open source JavaScript SIP client with WebRTC media stack.

name: simple-peer
description: WebRTC video, voice, and data channels abstraction for Node.js and the browser.

name: Netflux
description: Isomorphic JavaScript peer to peer transport API for client and server.

name: PeerJS
description: Data and media peer-to-peer connection API implemented over WebRTC.

name: libre
description: Portable SIP Stack along with companion libraries for media handling, STUN/TURN and a modular user agent.

name: PJSIP
description: Multi-protocol RTC library written in C.

name: eXosip
description: eXtended osip is a mature C library for abstracting the SIP protocol.

name: libdatachannel
description: Standalone WebRTC DataChannels C++ implementation.

name: libSRTP
description: Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP) library for C.

name: usrsctp
description: Portable Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) user-land stack.

name: rawrtc
description: WebRTC and ORTC library with a small footprint.

name: OSS Core
description: General purpose C++ library for Real Time Communications.

name: Open WebRTC Toolkit
description: WebRTC development toolkit with bindings for multiple platforms.

name: Pion
description: Extensive software stack for WebRTC written in Go.

name: gossip

name: siprocket
description: Fast SIP and SDP packet parser.

name: go-diameter
description: RFC compliant Diameter protocol library.

name: RTCKit/SIP

description: SIP stack application framework.

name: peerjs-python

name: NkSIP
description: Extendable SIP server framework.

name: ersip
description: Library comprising building blocks for SIP applications.

name: sipcore
description: Rust framework for creating SIP applications.

name: rtcrs/webrtc
